definition: to circle/to go back/to turn around/to answer/to return/to revolve/Hui ethnic group (Chinese Muslims)/time/classifier for acts of a play/section or chapter (of a classic book)

sentences.english: 'Madame has gone to Paris, ' Nanine answered.
sentences.chinese: “太太到巴黎去了，”纳尼娜回答我说。

sentences.english: But the little prince made no reply.
I always get a negative response.
sentences.chinese: 我向来都得到否定的回答。

sentences.english: Song Di affirmative answer, let Tian Hongle on the day.
sentences.chinese: 宋迪之的肯定回答，让田宏乐上了天。

sentences.english: He was completely honest in his reply.
sentences.chinese: 他的回答完全是坦坦荡荡。

sentences.english: All participants were given a series of questions about the true self.
sentences.chinese: 所有参与者都要回答有关真实的自我的一系列问题。

sentences.english: Give me a determinate answer to the problem.
sentences.chinese: 请对该问题给我一个确定的回答。

sentences.english: Her mom replied, “Because they love each other.” MMT
sentences.chinese: 她的妈妈回答道，“因为他们彼此相爱。”

sentences.english: Answer this question, and write an algorithm for the follow-up general case.
sentences.chinese: 回答此问题，并编写算法求解思考题。

sentences.english: Because I diden't have enough, but now I do. the little boy replied.
sentences.chinese: 因为我之前不够，但我现在已经够了，小孩回答。

sentences.english: But Jesus made no reply, not even to a single charge--to the great amazement of the governor.
sentences.chinese: 耶稣仍不回答，连一句话也不说，以致巡抚甚觉希奇。

sentences.english: Calmly wait ’til they’re done, and then provide the answer.
sentences.chinese: 冷静地等待，直到他们说完，然后再给出你的回答。

sentences.english: "No, lady, "came the reply. "You stick it on the envelope ! "
sentences.chinese: “不，夫人，”邮务员回答说，“要贴在信封上。”

sentences.english: “It raises one of the unanswered questions from our research,” Fogel says.
sentences.chinese: 它提出了我们研究中未回答的问题了。

sentences.english: Then Peter and the other apostles answered and said, We ought to obey God rather than men.
sentences.chinese: 彼得和众使徒回答说，顺从神，不顺从人，是应当的。

sentences.english: And he answered him to never a word; insomuch that the governor marvelled greatly.
sentences.chinese: 耶稣仍不回答，连一句话也不说，以致巡抚甚觉希奇。

definition: to ask (a question) in reply/to answer a question with a question/rhetorical question
to question/to ask/to raise a question
to speak/to say/to explain/to scold/to tell off/a theory (typically the last character in a compound, as in 日心說|日心说 heliocentric theory)
to question closely/to investigate in detail/to examine minutely/to get to the heart of the matter
yes, that's right/variant of 似的[shi4 de5]
to answer/to reply/Reply to: (in email header)
variant of 答覆|答复[da2 fu4]
